bug.author: dayhaha
bug.summary: seqToseq demo Pretrained model can't be downloaded
bug.description: I want to download the pretrained model by the script "wmt14_model.sh" in the seqToseq demo. The command is "wget <denchmark-link:https://www.googledrive.com/host/0B7Q8d52jqeI9ejh6Q1RpMTFQT1k/wmt14_model.tar.gz>https://www.googledrive.com/host/0B7Q8d52jqeI9ejh6Q1RpMTFQT1k/wmt14_model.tar.gz</denchmark-link> --no-check-certificate". I tried many kinds of VPNs but failed to download. So I wonder if you can provide a download site which can be reached in China without VPN.

comments.comment: You can have a look in wmt14_model.sh, it says: # you can also directly download from https://pan.baidu.com/s/1o8q577s
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/luotao1>@luotao1</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dayhaha>@dayhaha</denchmark-link> It should be added to Paddle CDN. I will handle it.
